scripts.version: lerna exec -- npm install --ignore-scripts --package-lock-only --no-audit && git add packages/*/package-lock.json
scripts.dependencies:list: npm list --depth=0 && lerna exec --no-bail -- npm list --depth=0
scripts.dependencies:outdated: npm outdated || true && lerna exec --no-bail -- npm outdated
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run clean:modules && rm -rf ./node_modules && npm i
